amendatorysection.catchline: County clerks; tax lists; budget allowance.
amendatorysection.para: In counties having over two hundred thousand population, where the county clerk makes the county and city tax lists, he shall be allowed a budget of twenty thousand dollars for clerks' salaries for making said tax lists.

annotation.para: Section does not impose on assistants of county clerk statutory duty of safekeeping public funds. State v. Boatman, 142 Neb. 589, 7 N.W.2d 159 (1942).
